languages.text: Силы Инквизиции провели на планете масштабную тайную операцию. Теперь они приступили к зачистке свидетелей, сильно вредящей функционированию колонии.

Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.
languages.original_text: Силы Инквизиции провели на планете масштабную тайную операцию. Теперь они приступили к зачистке свидетелей, сильно вредящей функционированию колонии.

traits.locale_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which has a severe impact on the colony's performance.
Your servants became witnesses of a secret Inquisitorial operation... and that is a problem.

Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.

languages.text: Des agents de l'Inquisition ont mené une vaste opération clandestine sur la planète. Ils s'occupent à présent de faire disparaître tous les témoins, ce qui a un impact non négligeable sur le bon fonctionnement de la colonie.
languages.original_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.

traits.locale_text: Des agents de l'Inquisition ont mené une vaste opération clandestine sur la planète. Ils s'occupent à présent de faire disparaître tous les témoins, ce qui a un impact non négligeable sur le bon fonctionnement de la colonie.

languages.text: 異端審問庁の諜報員がこの惑星で大規模な秘密工作を行った。現在、彼らはすべての証人を排除している真っ最中だ。それにより、コロニーの機能に深刻な影響を及ぼしている。
languages.original_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.

traits.locale_text: 異端審問庁の諜報員がこの惑星で大規模な秘密工作を行った。現在、彼らはすべての証人を排除している真っ最中だ。それにより、コロニーの機能に深刻な影響を及ぼしている。

languages.text: 审判庭的特工在这颗行星上执行了大规模的秘密行动。如今，他们正在处理所有目击者，这对殖民地的正常运转造成了重大影响。
languages.original_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.

traits.locale_text: 审判庭的特工在这颗行星上执行了大规模的秘密行动。如今，他们正在处理所有目击者，这对殖民地的正常运转造成了重大影响。

languages.text: Los agentes de la Inquisición han llevado a cabo una operación encubierta a gran escala en el planeta. Ahora están en proceso de eliminar a todos los testigos, lo que causa un gran impacto en la productividad de la colonia.
languages.original_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.

traits.locale_text: Los agentes de la Inquisición han llevado a cabo una operación encubierta a gran escala en el planeta. Ahora están en proceso de eliminar a todos los testigos, lo que causa un gran impacto en la productividad de la colonia.

languages.text: Agenten der Inquisition haben auf dem Planeten eine groß angelegte Geheimoperation durchgeführt. Nun sind sie dabei, alle Zeugen zu beseitigen, was die Aufrechterhaltung des Betriebs der Kolonie extrem gefährdet.
languages.original_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.

traits.locale_text: Agenten der Inquisition haben auf dem Planeten eine groß angelegte Geheimoperation durchgeführt. Nun sind sie dabei, alle Zeugen zu beseitigen, was die Aufrechterhaltung des Betriebs der Kolonie extrem gefährdet.

languages.text: Engizisyon ajanları, gezegende büyük ölçekli bir gizli operasyon düzenledi. Şimdiyse tüm tanıkları ortadan kaldırma sürecine geçtiler. Bu da koloninin işleyişine şiddetli bir şekilde etki ediyor.
languages.original_text: Agents of the Inquisition have carried out a large-scale covert operation on the planet. Now they are in the process of removing all witnesses, which is having a severe impact on the colony's functioning.
